songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
I'm just an itty bitty shard
Floating through the wind
I told her she could meet me at the park
But she never did
I cried and cried and waited to the dark
Behind the lunar glare
Twirling, swirling
Feeling so at home within her locks of hair

[Break]
You, you

[Verse 2]
Tell me where you've been
Where you've been
I'm running around feeling crazy
But I know it's just because you called me 'baby'
songs.title: Little Shard
